name: Aftermath Crumble
description:
-escape the death game before it crumbles-

Information:

Content Warnings: flashing lights, death, violence, some swearing, mild gore (in writing), emotional abuse/manipulation

Note for the Judges: There are bonus materials from our planning phase before the jam. These are specifically marked for the judges as they are not part of the jam effort!

Features:

  • Full voice acting
  • 5 CGs
  • Two endings
  • A full soundtrack
  • Animated sprites

How to Play: Left-click or hit space or enter to advance text. Hold ctrl to skip past already seen dialogue. Right-click to access the menu, including a help screen with further commands.

Accessibility: Turn on closed captions or an easily readable font from the preferences, or hit shift + A for the extended accessibility menu.

Created for Spooktober 2022.

Wait, is this a sequel?

No, but it's set in the same universe as PPT and PWE, although on a different timeline.
